import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function RatingForm() { const [body , setBody] = useState({ rate : "", feedback : "" }); const onsubmit = async (data) => { console.log(data); let url = "http://localhost:3030/createRate"; const rawResponse = await fetch(url, { method: "POST", headers: { Accept: "application/json", "Content-type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ rate: body.rate, feedback: body.feedback }), }) } return ( <>
